meta.title: ID Verification | Folio Wallet
meta.description: Check official documents and confirm identity in more than 200 places around the world.

hero.title: Verify government IDs with confidence
hero.description: Check official documents and confirm identity in more than 200 places around the world.

global.title: Global ID support
global.description: Recognize and validate a wide range of government issued documents, including passports and driver licenses.

fraud.title: Smart fraud protection
fraud.description: Spot altered or tampered IDs with precise capture flows and intelligent authenticity checks.

fast.title: Fast automated results
fast.description: Most verifications finish in a few seconds, giving users a smooth and quick experience.

setup.title: Customize the verification experience
setup.description: Define which documents users can submit and how verification is performed.

capture.title: Capture identity documents
capture.description: Users scan their government ID. Folio reads the data and checks if the document is genuine.

verify.title: Verify and make a decision
verify.description: Approve, decline or send the case for review based on your rules.

keyFeatures.title: Key features
keyFeatures.description: Leverage best-in-class technology to verify government IDs globally

global.title: Works across the world
global.description: Support for hundreds of government IDs from more than 200 regions.

guidance.title: Clear capture guidance
guidance.description: On screen instructions help users take clean and accurate document photos.

autoCapture.title: Automatic photo capture
autoCapture.description: The system takes the photo at the perfect moment, reducing retries.

extraction.title: Precise data extraction
extraction.description: Read and structure data directly from the ID, then verify it for consistency.

sensitive.title: Sensitive data control
sensitive.description: Hide personal fields when needed to protect user information.

custom.title: Custom checks
custom.description: Add your own rules for document validity, expiry and data accuracy.

faceMatch.title: Face match
faceMatch.description: Compare a live selfie with the ID photo to confirm the person behind the document.

profile.title: Profile matching
profile.description: Check ID data against existing accounts to avoid duplicates.

automated.title: Automated decisions
automated.description: Let the system handle most verifications instantly, minimizing manual work.

useCases.title: Practical uses for government ID checks

kyc.title: KYC compliance
kyc.description: Strengthen your KYC flow by confirming the authenticity of government issued IDs.

identity.title: Identity assurance
identity.description: Meet assurance needs with verified documents and a live face match.

friction.title: Dynamic friction
friction.description: Adjust verification steps based on the data extracted from the document.

cta.title: Let's build better identity verification
cta.description: Talk to our team to explore how Folio can enhance your onboarding and verification experience.

items.a: Folio supports passports, national ID cards, driver licenses and residence permits from over 200 countries and regions.
Most verifications complete in under 10 seconds. Complex cases that require manual review may take longer.

items.q: How does Folio detect fraudulent documents?
items.a: Folio uses AI-powered checks to detect alterations, tampering, and forgeries. The system analyzes document structure, security features, fonts and metadata to spot inconsistencies.

items.q: Can I customize the verification flow?
items.a: Yes. You can define which documents to accept, set custom validation rules, configure automated decisions and add step-up verification when needed.

items.q: Is the verification process compliant with regulations?
items.a: Folio helps meet KYC and AML requirements across jurisdictions. The platform provides audit trails and detailed verification reports for compliance purposes.

items.q: What happens if a document cannot be verified automatically?
items.a: Cases that cannot be resolved automatically are flagged for manual review. Your team can examine the document and make a decision using the Review Workspace.

items.q: Does Folio support NFC chip reading?
items.a: Yes. For documents with NFC chips (like e-passports), Folio can read and verify the chip data for an extra layer of authenticity.
